name: 18 Wheels of Steel: Haulin'
description: Haul Some! Kick Some! Life on the road is filled with obstacles. Do you have the juice to go from gearjammer to boss man in the trucking business? Climb in the can and find out! You're steering the whole operation, from choosing the trucks and trailers to hiring the drivers in your fleet. Avoid the hazards and you'll be haulin' it in. Work hard and you might end up driving the whole show!
